entity.name: parserp
entity.comment: A protocol for parsers of probabilistic logic programs.

predicate.name: plp_rules/3
predicate.comment: Parses a list of codes into probabilistic and deterministic rules.

argument.name: probabilistic logic program
argument.description: Some probabilistic logic program encoded in a list of codes.

argument.name: probabilistic rules
argument.description: A list of probabilistic rules, expressed as compounds of the form probrule(head:term, probability:between(float,0,1), body:list).

argument.name: deterministic rules
argument.description: A list of deterministic rules, expressed as standard Prolog clauses.
